N. K. [Formulating a convincing rationale for a research study](https://doi.org/10.1080/17521882.2011.648335). Coaching: An International Journal of Theory, Research and Practice 5, 55‚Äì61 (2012). ::: ::: :::: ## Good research question: Descriptive + Explanatory Being able to provide meaningful explanations requires answers to ‚Äòwhy‚Äô (i.e. explanatory) questions in addition to ‚Äòwhat‚Äô (i.e. descriptive) questions.
